title: Truly Yours
description: I knew within moments of meeting Mason Holt that he would change my life forever. I just didn’t realize how much. As my world spirals out of control, he continues to protect and take care of me. Being just friends is all he’s been able to offer, but when a life-changing event happens, our relationship blossoms into something more.  When I think we can finally be together, someone threatens to tear us apart. I’m not the same girl Mason met years ago, but I’m determined to fight for what I’ve always wanted—him.TRULY YOURS is book 2 in the Mason & Sophie duet and must be read in order.
author: Kennedy Fox
